title: Hair of the Dog
description: Hair of the Dog is a collection of shorts I created for the Tequila Mockingbird release on June 27, 2014. They were scattered about the internet and hosted by a delightful group of bloggers who were crazy enough to indulge me.I promised to gather up all the pieces and make them available in one document. So here it is. In full mobi, epub and pdf formats.These are free. Do not pay for this book. Share it, print it out, plaster your bathroom with it but most of all, I encourage you to read more books. And not just mine.Any books.It can be found at the site below in three formats; mobi, ePub and pdf.
author: Rhys Ford
